Constructor Detail

NextTime

NextTime()
Method Detail

createNewLists

public void createNewLists(java.util.Vector words,
                           UserInfo user_info,
                           java.util.Vector elt_reading_vector,
                           java.util.Vector elt_writing_vector)
This utility creates a file named after the words last test date in milliseconds (reading or writing type specific) which contains the word id and the words category file name.

Old notes:

Parameters:
Vector - elt_reading_vector is the Elapsed Level Time vector for reading times.
elt_writing_vector - for writing times. These give the times till the next test by level.

the return argument is stored in the wntd file so that both files can be changed later.

This method caused a lot of problems for us. We created the whole quaquaverse 0.4/0.5 app just to track down all our problems to this spot.

Based on createLists in org.catechis.dto.WordLastTestDates but uses longs instead of strings for the dates.

createWLTDEntry

public java.lang.String createWLTDEntry(long last_date,
                                        Word word,
                                        java.lang.String test_list_folder,
                                        java.lang.String subject,
                                        java.lang.String type)
*Based on createWLTDEntry but with a long passed in directly. Create a file entry in user_id_folder/vocab/lists/wldt *type* folder for the last test.

Your going away with me alright, in a garbage bag. (Dexter to Leila).

getUniqueFile

private java.lang.String getUniqueFile(long milliseconds,
                                       java.lang.String folder)

We check the folder/file.xml passed in to see if it exists, if it does, then we increment the milliseconds by one and check repeatedly until we get a unique file name to return.

Same as getUniqueKey in org,catechis.dto,WordNextTestDates except instead of keys the files in the /vocab/lists/wltd/ folder there are files named after the milliseconds.

getTimeTilNextTest

private java.lang.String getTimeTilNextTest(Word word,
                                            long milliseconds,
                                            java.lang.String type,
                                            java.util.Vector elt_vector)
Add the exclude date to the last test date to decide when the next test should be.

makePathToLists

private java.lang.String makePathToLists(UserInfo user_info)
Creates a path to the test lists folder.

Parameters:
root_path -
user_id -
subject -
Returns:
"root/files/id/subj/lists/wltd" so the user can add " "+type.
